title: Quiz - Révision Générale Semaine 2
description: Quiz de révision sur tous les concepts de la semaine 2

questions.question: Which sentence combines personality and physical description correctly?
options: She is kind and has long hair
She have kind and tall hair
questions.explanation: Use 'is' for personality traits and 'has' for physical characteristics.

questions.question: How do you describe your family member's personality?
questions.explanation: 'My sister is funny' correctly uses 'is' for personality description.

questions.question: What's the best way to give a complete description?
questions.explanation: Complete descriptions include both physical features and personality traits.
